类 ShardLockObtainFailedException

  • java.lang.Object

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, Writeable, ToXContent, ToXContentFragment
    public class ShardLockObtainFailedException
extends ElasticsearchException
    Exception used when the in-memory lock for a shard cannot be obtained
